compHeading.title: Technology Careers at the Commonwealth of Massachusetts

keyMessage.subtitle: From education, to healthcare and beyond, the work of more than 150 agencies across Massachusetts touches every aspect of our lives. We are a diverse team of mission-driven IT professionals supporting this vital work.

compHeading.title: Learn about our projects and the people behind them

campaignFullWidthFeature.title: Improving emergency response with mapping technology
campaignFullWidthFeature.text:
“The work we do at MassGIS supports dispatch, police, fire, and medical professionals who respond to emergency situations. It could benefit all of those who live, visit, and work in the Commonwealth.”

John Smith Doe, GIS Analyst

campaignFeature2up.title: From an IT training program to EOTSS Team Lead
campaignFeature2up.text:
“I’m really impressed with the people who work here. I’ve met individuals who have mentored me and helped me build the skills needed to be successful.”

John Smith, Identity & Access Management Specialist

campaignFeature2up.title: How a Texas transplant makes Mass.gov work for content authors
campaignFeature2up.text:
“It’s fun and exciting to have an opportunity to work hand-in-hand with partner agencies who want to understand and improve the constituent experience.”

Jane Doe, Project Manager
